case.title: Internships don't pay well , but I do:) - 40 (Upper West Side)
case.text:
Are you white Asian Spanish 18-26 and busty. Well if you need some extra cash and want to have fun with a older nice looking man this summer I can help.
I am 40 in great shape and fun to date:) I am a clean cut white man 6ft tall .
Must see your pics to reply. Up to 400 per meeting. No pros please.
